content.rendered:
Handshake regularly hosts webinars to bring the career center community together to educate and learn from each other. Visit our Webinars Hub to see recent and upcoming events spotlighting innovative best practices from your peers, product updates from the Handshake team, and trends and insights in campus recruiting.

Visit the Career Center Webinars Hub

excerpt.rendered: Regularly scheduled programming to bring the career center community together around the latest insights, trends, and best practices
